This is Breckworld! If you have an account please Login, if not Sign Up. Time for some fun!
Sign up Log in Terms of Service Privacy Policy Welcome back Username Password Create account or Login? Join BreckWorld and reach for the Stars! Collect Stars and Offers! First Name Last Name Email Register Success Login Success 1. Use of the App
By downloading or using this App, these terms will automatically apply to you. You should make sure that you have read them carefully before doing so. If you do not agree to these terms you must not download or use the App. You may want to print a copy of these terms for your reference.
You are also responsible for ensuring that all persons who use or access the App through your internet connection or your device(s) are aware of these terms and the other applicable terms described in clause 2, and that they comply with them.
Intellectual property rights in or arising from this App and its contents belong to Viewing Online Limited (‚Äúthe Company‚Äù). Use of the App and its contents is limited to your private and non-commercial use purposes only and you must not be further exploit without prior written permission of the Company.
2. Other applicable terms
These terms are supplemented by the Company‚Äôs Privacy Policy.
3. Changes to these terms of use
The Company is committed to ensuring that this App is useful and efficient as possible. For that reason, it reserves the right to make changes to the App or withdraw the App, at any time and for any reason.
The Company may amend these terms from time to time. Please check these terms regularly to ensure you understand the terms that apply at that time. If you access the App after the Company has made changes to the terms you will be treated as having accepted the change.
4. Accuracy of Content
The App and content is provided for your general information only and the Company gives no guarantees or warranties that it is accurate, complete, up to date nor that it will always be available, be uninterrupted or error free. It is not intended to amount to advice.
Although the Company make reasonable efforts to update the information on its app, the Company makes no representations, warranties or guarantees, whether express or implied that the content on our App is accurate, complete or up-to-date.
The content of any services featured in the App are subject to change at any time without notice.
5. Location Settings
You agree to receive pre-programmed notifications on the App if you have turned on locational services on your devices.
6. Liability
Nothing in these terms shall exclude the Company‚Äôs liability where it would be unlawful to do so. This includes the Company‚Äôs liability for death or personal injury caused by its negligence or for fraud.
The Company shall not be liable for any acts or omissions of any third parties howsoever caused.
The Company will not be liable directly, indirectly, incidentally, specially, consequentially or punitively for damages, howsoever caused, resulting from or in connection with the App and any services offered in the App, your access to, use of or inability to use the App, reliance on or downloading from the App, or any delays, inaccuracies in the information or in its transmission, including, without limitation, theft of your device or information or corruption of your information, the inability to use the App, device failure or malfunction.
The Company will not be liable for any loss or damage caused by a virus or other technologically harmful material that may infect your device.
You must not:
introduce any virus to the App;
in any way attempt to access, alter, de-compile, otherwise interfere with any part of the App.
use the App for any unlawful purpose.
I wish to participate in the App. I understand that there are risks and dangers inherent in participating in walks using this APP.
I hereby assume all of the risks associated with this APP and to release and hold harmless Viewing Online Limited and Breckland District Council.
I understand and agree that these terms are binding on my heirs, assigns, next of kin, executors and administrators and legal representatives.
I certify that I am physically fit and have no health related reasons or problems to preclude my use of the App. I certify that I have not been advised otherwise by a qualified medical person. I understand that I am solely responsible for my health and safety, and I acknowledge that I am physically capable of participating in this activity. This App is designed to be used outdoors, I understand that I will remain aware of the environment I am in and avoid going into inappropriate areas or an area where I am not permitted to be.
7. Applicable law
These terms shall be governed by the laws of England and you and the Company submit to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts of England to resolve any dispute between you that may arise as a result of these terms or arising out of or in connection with the use of the App.
8. Safety
Your safety is of paramount importance to both Breckland District Council and Viewing Online Ltd. It is vital that you stay alert to your surroundings when collecting augmented items in AR View mode. Never look at your phone when crossing roads or when in the vicinity of any potential obstacles that could impact yours or others‚Äô safety. Breckland District Council and Viewing Online Ltd take no responsibility for injury or death associated with usage of the BreckWorld app. Breckland District Council and Viewing Online Ltd also take no responsibility for injury or death associated with using the BreckWorld app in conjunction with a VR Headset/Head Mounted Display (HMD). We urge all users to stay safe and be vigilant while using the BreckWorld app. If you do, you‚Äôll have a fantastic experience.
9. Special Offer Participating Businesses
For every 10 stars that you collect using the BreckWorld app, you will be provided with a list of Special Offers to choose from.
These can range from 10% - 50% off entry to local attractions or be discounts for restaurants around Breckland. Simply choose whichever Special Offer works best for you and redeem it on the day you visit.
It is important to note that, as a charity trying to generate maximum revenue to help the animals they care for and protect, Banham Zoo are NOT participating in Special Offers. Please do still visit this amazing attraction for a fantastic day out while helping the animals you‚Äôll see there.
10. Compatibility
AR View mode is only compatible with iPhone 6s and later released iPhone models. Users can still enjoy the app and virtually explore BreckWorld 360 Experiences on iPhone models earlier than iPhone 6s but may not be able to enjoy the AR View mode features including treasure hunt and floating offers located down Breckland‚Äôs High Streets. Breckland District Council and Viewing Online Ltd take no responsibility for any emotional, physical or financial damage related to usage of the BreckWorld app.
I certify that I have read these terms and fully understand their content. If I am 18 years or younger at the time of participating, my parent or legal guardian has completely reviewed these terms, understands and consents to them and authorises my participation by agreeing to them. Effective date: October 11, 2018
Viewing Online Limited ("us", "we", or "our") operates the Breck World mobile application (the "Service").
This page informs you of our policies regarding the collection, use, and disclosure of personal data when you use our Service and the choices you have associated with that data.
We use your data to provide and improve the Service. By using the Service, you agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this policy. Unless otherwise defined in this Privacy Policy, terms used in this Privacy Policy have the same meanings as in our Terms and Conditions.
Information Collection and Use
We collect several different types of information for various purposes to provide and improve our Service to you.
Types of Data Collected
Personal Data
While using our Service, we may ask you to provide us with certain personally identifiable information that can be used to contact or identify you ("Personal Data"). Personally identifiable information may include, but is not limited to:
First name and last name
Cookies and Usage Data
Usage Data
We may also collect information that your browser sends whenever you visit our Service or when you access the Service by or through a mobile device ("Usage Data").
This Usage Data may include information such as your computer's Internet Protocol address (e.g. IP address), browser type, browser version, the pages of our Service that you visit, the time and date of your visit, the time spent on those pages, unique device identifiers and other diagnostic data.
When you access the Service by or through a mobile device, this Usage Data may include information such as the type of mobile device you use, your mobile device unique ID, the IP address of your mobile device, your mobile operating system, the type of mobile Internet browser you use, unique device identifiers and other diagnostic data.
Tracking & Cookies Data
We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to track the activity on our Service and hold certain information.
Cookies are files with small amount of data which may include an anonymous unique identifier. Cookies are sent to your browser from a website and stored on your device. Tracking technologies also used are beacons, tags, and scripts to collect and track information and to improve and analyse our Service.
You can instruct your browser to refuse all cookies or to indicate when a cookie is being sent. However, if you do not accept cookies, you may not be able to use some portions of our Service.
Examples of Cookies we use:
Session Cookies. We use Session Cookies to operate our Service.
Preference Cookies. We use Preference Cookies to remember your preferences and various settings.
Security Cookies. We use Security Cookies for security purposes.
Use of Data
Viewing Online Limited uses the collected data for various purposes:
To provide and maintain the Service
To notify you about changes to our Service
To allow you to participate in interactive features of our Service when you choose to do so
To provide customer care and support
To provide analysis or valuable information so that we can improve the Service
To monitor the usage of the Service
To detect, prevent and address technical issues
Transfer Of Data
Your information, including Personal Data, may be transferred to ‚Äî and maintained on ‚Äî computers located outside of your country where the data protection laws may differ than those from your jurisdiction.
If you are located outside United Kingdom and choose to provide information to us, please note that we transfer the data, including Personal Data, to United Kingdom and process it there.
Your consent to this Privacy Policy followed by your submission of such information represents your agreement to that transfer.
Viewing Online Limited will take all steps reasonably necessary to ensure that your data is treated securely and in accordance with this Privacy Policy and no transfer of your Personal Data will take place to an organization or a country unless there are adequate controls in place including the security of your data and other personal information.

Disclosure Of Data
Legal Requirements
Viewing Online Limited may disclose your Personal Data in the good faith belief that such action is necessary to:
To comply with a legal obligation
To protect and defend the rights or property of Viewing Online Limited
To prevent or investigate possible wrongdoing in connection with the Service
To protect the personal safety of users of the Service or the public
To protect against legal liability
Security Of Data
The security of your data is important to us, but remember that no method of transmission over the Internet, or method of electronic storage is 100% secure. While we strive to use commercially acceptable means to protect your Personal Data, we cannot guarantee its absolute security.
Service Providers
We may employ third party companies and individuals to facilitate our Service ("Service Providers"), to provide the Service on our behalf, to perform Service-related services or to assist us in analysing how our Service is used.
These third parties have access to your Personal Data only to perform these tasks on our behalf and are obligated not to disclose or use it for any other purpose.
Analytics
We may use third-party Service Providers to monitor and analyse the use of our Service.
Google Analytics
Google Analytics is a web analytics service offered by Google that tracks and reports website traffic. Google uses the data collected to track and monitor the use of our Service. This data is shared with other Google services. Google may use the collected data to contextualize and personalize the ads of its own advertising network.
For more information on the privacy practices of Google, please visit the Google Privacy & Terms web page: https://policies.google.com/privacy?hl=en
Links To Other Sites
Our Service may contain links to other sites that are not operated by us. If you click on a third party link, you will be directed to that third party's site. We strongly advise you to review the Privacy Policy of every site you visit.
We have no control over and assume no responsibility for the content, privacy policies or practices of any third party sites or services.
Children's Privacy
As part of our Terms of Service, it is a requirement that parents of users that are 18 years or younger at the time of participating, completely reviewed these terms, understand and consent to them and authorises their participation by agreeing to them.
Changes To This Privacy Policy
You are advised to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any changes. Changes to this Privacy Policy are effective when they are posted on this page.
Contact Us
If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us:
By email: hello@breckworld.com https://policies.google.com/privacy?hl=en hello@breckworld.com Star Clues Collected stars When you collect Stars they appear here. For every 10 stars you collect you get to choose a discount to one of BreckWorld's Attractions! Select city Select your interest and get amazing offers Attractions Explore all the best cupons near you Free Fun Try the local cousine, eat vegetarian Eat and Drink Have some fun to create lasting memories Search Results Collect Offers and Special Rewards to fill up your Wallet No description Settings Start Tutorial Report Issue Edit Profile Log out Change Profile Photo Save Try again

We will use the email address you inputted when creating your BreckWorld account to reply Start tutorial Do you want to start tutorial? No Yes Press Play and Stephen Fry will tell you all about what‚Äôs inside BreckWorld and how to play Video Controls: The bottom right button goes full screen. Tilt your phone to landscape when in full screen mode for the best quality and swipe your finger to look around. In full screen landscape mode you can tap the Headset button to experience it in VR if you have a Headset. Experience all five of BreckWorld‚Äôs 360 Towns by tapping an image and pressing Play Experience a selection of BreckWorld‚Äôs 360 Attractions ‚Äì use the Search tab to find lots more The Home tab always returns you to this screen Use the Search tab to find all the Attractions, Free Fun and Places to Eat & Drink inside BreckWorld Use the AR View tab navigate your way to Treasure, collect Rewards and find Offers floating down our High Streets Use the Stars tab to see 360 Clues about where BreckWorld‚Äôs 100 Stars are hidden and to keep track of all the Stars you‚Äôve already collected Use the Wallet tab to see all of the Rewards and Offers that you‚Äôve collected and redeemed inside BreckWorld Choose if you‚Äôd like to search All BreckWorld or a specific town The Attractions category is to search for paid attractions The Free Fun category is to search for any fun that costs nothing to enjoy The Eat & Drink category is to search for places you can eat or grab a drink The top half of the screen is where you can see treasure floating in the air and tap to collect it. Pinch zoom the bottom half (Map) to see routes to the closest Stars Tap to open each Star Clue to get a better idea of where each Star is located Tap the Collected Stars tab to see all of the Stars you‚Äôve collected on your adventures around BreckWorld All Rewards and Offers that you‚Äôve collected and redeemed on your adventure are stored here All of your Profile and Settings are contained inside this button This button contains information about BreckWorld such as ToS, Privacy Policy and an option to Report an Issue Adults Children Claim coupon
